entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle this afternoon. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then light late this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
